creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
This isn't a new bug, it did exist previously where admin's couldn't publish
either. The issue is, sitemanagers and previously admins have the proper rights
to  publish.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Is there a consensus that sitemanangers should be allowed to publish?

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
I don't know. The question is, what determines who can publish? Sitemanagers are
granted permission to workflow.publish. To me this means they should be able to
publish. Something else other than the usecase permissions is blocking this.
Same with reject and deactivate.

I guess the usecases are blocked by the workflow role conditions. The issue
usecase vs. workflow permissions is currently being discussed on the dev list.
creator: andreas@apache.org
